DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to identify which ultrasonographic feature or a combination of features is the best predictor of thyroid cancer in thyroid nodules.
DOC.brief_title: Prediction of Thyroid Cancer From Ultrasonographic Characteristics of Thyroid Nodules
DOC.criteria: Subjects with thyroid nodules over 10 mm in the longest diameter Euthyroid or hypothyroid subjects with a solitary thyroid nodule or multinodular goiter Subjects with a hypoactive nodule in the thyroid scan and a low TSH Subjects with four or more thyroid nodules that are over 10 mm Subjects with low TSH and hyperactive nodule on thyroid scan
